item.title: Investing in Capital Markets
item.description: The Stock Market To trade in the NSE, open a CDS account with a CDA (some commercial banks, stockbrokers, investment banks). In 2006, an Automatic Trading System was introduced so that orders are matched automatically and executed by stockbrokers on a first-come first-served basis. Govt bonds have also been added to the ATS. Securities lending, short-selling and same day turnaround trades are not yet permitted. (kestrelcapital.com) I guess that's why quant funds are not a thing in Kenya.

item.title: Investment Vehicles in Kenya
item.description: Investing through Groups (Chamas) www.kaig.org has developed a Chama Handbook to boost accountability and profitability. But chamas have a higher chance of being guided by friendships than profitability. For instance, how do I go about picking a chama? It's most likely a referral from a friend who's already in a chama. Kenya USA Diaspora Sacco Mavuno Term Deposit pays 8% interest for >1m KES and <2m KES deposited for a year.

item.title: The Curious Case of African ETFs
item.description: etfdb.com has ETFs tracking regions. Surprised that Kenya isn't on it. And they're all losing money - best (over 5 years) is SA at -14.59%, Nigeria is at -64%. Why all the PR on Africa being the next big investment scene? Of course, Kenya's the premier investment destination (invest.go.ke) Am I reading this right?? SOXL (semiconductors) ETF has >700% return over 5 years etfdb.com
